item.title: Shiny App to Enhance my Favorite TV Show
item.description: title: “Shiny App to Enhance my Favorite TV Show” author: “John Friel” date: ‘2018-02-10’ slug: Shiny-App-to-Enhance-My-Favorite-TV-Show categories: - Shiny tags: - Shiny Enhancing Shark Tank – Net Worth Compare Tool At some point in an episode of Shark Tank I end up thinking: “Well Mark Cuban is worth 3 billion so this deal is the equivalent of me investing 15 dollars.” I use estimates and never fully know what each Shark is worth.
